all-classes.description: Documentation for classes includes syntax, usage information, and code samples for methods, properties, and event handlers and listeners for those APIs that belong to a specific class in ActionScript. The classes are listed alphabetically. If you are not sure to which class a certain method or property belongs, you can look it up in the Index.

deprecated.shortDescription: A list of deprecated items and suggested alternatives when available.

package.name: org.robotlegs.adapters
package.shortDescription: Adapters to bridge third-party Di/IoC and reflection libraries
package.longDescription: Adapters to bridge third-party Di/IoC and reflection libraries

package.name: org.robotlegs.starling.base
package.shortDescription: Base classes used to build custom Robotlegs frameworks
package.longDescription: Base classes used to build custom Robotlegs frameworks

package.name: org.robotlegs.starling.core
package.shortDescription: The core Robotlegs Framework apparatus contracts
package.longDescription: The core Robotlegs Framework apparatus contracts

package.name: org.robotlegs.starling.mvcs
package.shortDescription: The reference MVCS Robotlegs Framework implementation
package.longDescription: The reference MVCS Robotlegs Framework implementation
